statements: SELECT infra_name, infra_type, location FROM transportation_infrastructure;
SELECT infra_id, infra_name FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Road';
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY infra_name DESC;
SELECT infra_id, infra_name FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE infra_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT count(*) AS total_infrastructure FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Bridge';
SELECT infra_id, infra_name FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY infra_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Bridge';
SELECT infra_name, ST_AsText(location) FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Airport';
SELECT infra_name, infra_type FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE ST_X(location) > 0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_infrastructures FROM transportation_infrastructure;
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE road_type = 'Highway';
SELECT road_name, road_type FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE road_condition = 'Good';
SELECT id, road_name, road_condition FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY road_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM bridge_information WHERE length > 100 AND height > 20;
SELECT bridge_name, length, height FROM bridge_information ORDER BY length ASC, height DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure;
SELECT road_name, road_type FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY road_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM bridge_information WHERE height > 20 AND length > 50;
SELECT id, bridge_name, location FROM bridge_information WHERE length BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY length ASC;
SELECT road_name, COUNT(*) AS road_count FROM transportation_infrastructure GROUP BY road_name HAVING road_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT bridge_name, year_built FROM bridges WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT signal_id, location, status FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT bridge_name, bridge_type, year_built FROM bridges WHERE bridge_type = 'suspension';
SELECT * FROM transportation_infrastructure ORDER BY road_name DESC;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM transportation_infrastructure WHERE road_length > 10;
SELECT * FROM bridges WHERE year_built < 2000;
SELECT bridge_name, bridge_type, year_built FROM bridges WHERE bridge_type = 'Suspension';
SELECT location, signal_type, status FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'Operational' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_length FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_stations WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT station_name, station_type FROM transportation_stations WHERE station_type = 'bus_stop';
SELECT signal_name, signal_location FROM traffic_signals WHERE activation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_length > 100
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_length < 50 ORDER BY route_length DESC
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) FROM transportation_routes GROUP BY route_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT route_name, start_point_geom, end_point_geom FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_length BETWEEN 50 AND 150
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM transportation_stations WHERE operational_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transportation_networks;
SELECT network_name, geographic_region FROM transportation_networks WHERE network_type = 'Highway';
SELECT intersection_name, latitude, longitude FROM intersections ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM roads WHERE road_type = 'Freeway' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bridges WHERE construction_year > 2000 ORDER BY length_m DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_networks ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM transportation_networks WHERE geographic_region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE length_km > 50 ORDER BY length_km DESC;
SELECT bridge_name, construction_year FROM bridges WHERE length_m > 100 ORDER BY construction_year ASC;
SELECT intersection_name, latitude, longitude FROM intersections WHERE intersection_type = 'Roundabout' ORDER BY intersection_name;
